UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Activity and Synergy of Cu-ATCUN Antimicrobial Peptides
Literature.Author: Greve JM, Cowan JA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27583(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=8µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=4µM)
